column3: Spectral index that will be use when fitting the energy distribution within an energy bin.
Scale factor that sets the strength of the prior on nuisance parameters that are free.  Setting this to None disables the prior.
Fix all background parameters before starting the fit. If False then any parameters that are currently free in the model will be fit simultaneously with the source of interest.

Free normalizations of background sources within this angular distance in degrees from the source of interest.  If None then no sources will be freed.  Note that this parameter supersedes `fix_background`.
Confidence level for upper limit calculation.
Use a power-law approximation to the shape of the global spectrum in each bin.  If this is false then a constant index set to `bin_index` will be used.
